org.openimaj.image.processing.effects

Class DioramaEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.effects.DioramaEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageProcessor<FImage>, Processor<FImage>, SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>

    public class DioramaEffect
extends Object
implements SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>
    Class to produce a Diorama or "Minature Faking" effect. The effect is achieved by blurring the image with a kernel that increases size with distance from a tilt-axis. In this implementation we use a SummedAreaTable to efficiently compute box-blurs.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
